data.name: DIY Super Saver
data.description: Our DIY Super Saver Account is a cash account specifically designed for self-managed super funds. Offering you greater control over how you invest your superannuation funds, the DIY Super Saver Account is simple to open and easy to operate. You can leave your funds in the account to earn a high interest rate, or move money between your choice of investments

features.additionalValue: Members can set up a variety of notifications in Internet Banking

features.additionalInfo: Earn high interest specifically designed for self-managed superannuation funds

eligibility.additionalInfo: Only self-managed super funds can open a DIY Super Saver Account.

eligibility.additionalValue: Self-managed super fund must be registered in Australia

discounts.description: You can earn Relationship Reward Rebates that can offset or eliminate your eligible fees. These allowances are dependent on the combined balance of your savings and loan accounts.
discounts.additionalInfo: Your monthly balances for calculating your free transactions allowance are the total closing balances on the last day of the previous month of all your deposit, loan, overdraft and credit card accounts. Unused limits on overdrafts and credit cards are not considered. Negative balances of deposit accounts are deducted from the total. Balances in joint accounts are considered towards the allowance for the primary account holder only. Any unused transaction allowance cannot be carried forward to offset fees in future months. The maximum rebate paid in any given month will not exceed the amount incurred in eligible fees.

fees.name: Copies of statements (up to 12 months) at branch

Dormancy fee for accounts inactive greater
than 24 months
Swift transfers
fees.additionalInfo: Electronic funds transfer between Australian Military Bank and other financial institutions

fees.name: Copies of statements (over 12 months) per page
Foreign Cash
fees.additionalInfo: 1% of AUD value of amount purchased. Minimum order of AU$100 applies

fees.name:
Amendment/ cancellation of
telegraphic transfer/swift transfers

Inactive fee for accounts inactive 12 months
or greater
Archive retrieval fee
fees.additionalInfo: A hourly fee applies plus any expenses incurred
